module.name: part_occurrence
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the characterization of occurrences of a product in a product structure.

inscope.li: identification of the occurrence of a product version in a product structure;
relationship of the occurrence of a product version with the definition of this product version it is derived from;
characterization of a product occurrence that is defined from a product specification;
characterization of the quantity of a product occurrence;
specialization of the concept of product occurrence to represent occurrences of a part.

outscope.li: relationships with functions or alternative solution the part occurrence provides a solution element for;
description of the use case of a part occurrence in a product family.

ae.refpath: product_definition <- product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition product_definition_relationship {product_definition_relationship.name = 'definition usage'} product_definition_relationship.relating_product_definition -> product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part definition'}

alt_map.description: If the Quantified_instance is not used in an assembly
If the Quantified_instance is only used in an assembly and is a Definition_based_part_occurrence This mapping is specified for upward compatibility with ISO 10303-203:1994
alt_map.refpath: quantified_assembly_component_usage <= assembly_component_usage assembly_component_usage <= product_definition_usage product_definition_usage <= product_definition_relationship product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition -> product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part definition'}

alt_map.description: If the Quantified_instance is only used in an assembly and is a Specification_based_part_occurrence This mapping resolves a no-mapping case of ISO 10303-214:2001
alt_map.refpath: quantified_assembly_component_usage <= assembly_component_usage assembly_component_usage <= product_definition_usage product_definition_usage <= product_definition_relationship product_definition_relationship.related_product_definition -> product_definition {product_definition.frame_of_reference -> product_definition_context product_definition_context <= application_context_element application_context_element.name = 'part occurrence'}

alt_map.description: If the Quantified_instance is not only used in an assembly This dual mapping enables import processors designed to process only assembly relationship entities to interpret correctly a simple assembly structure.
